description: So I tried it out and guess what it gives me: Error Os { code: 2, kind: NotFound, message: "No such file or directory" };Please navigate here ["https://accounts.spotify.com/authorize?response_type=code&redirect_uri=http:%2F%2Flocalhost:8888%2Fcallback&client_id=cc1eb0c36ba84913b921a5928e6e6d81&scope=playlist-read-private%20user-library-modify%20user-library-read%20user-modify-playback-state%20user-read-currently-playing%20user-read-playback-state%20user-read-private%20user-read-recently-played&state=K3kXnR1aT8khgVl0&"]
make sure to add the callback link

To the 2 star reviewer: 

Remember to read the instructions:

Go to the url in the error "Please navigate here ["https://xxxxThisIsTheURLxxxxxx..."
Accept the permisions.
It'll redirect you to a blank page, just copy and past the url of that page back into the terminal.

Done!

It'd be nice if the process was clearer or automated but I'm guessing thats a problem with Spotify's developer API
summary: Works Fine, looking forward to see where it goes from here

description:
works well, looks cool
but it needs scrolling i have a 300 song playlist and i can only play the first 20
it also needs to work on its own.
other then that is Cool
The concept is great and it is lovely to use. No problems yet. Still a lot of potential, but not bad at all.
summary: Brilliant idea! Great to use when in the flow while coding

description: I made the setupt in the description, installed the app but it won't let me play any song. It throws an error like "the API device was not found" - something similar. Apparently i have to make an api call and find out what devices I can use.

Working great on Ubuntu 20.04

Installing spotifyd service was a bit of a pain, the snap seems broken so I did it manually.

My laptop was pretty low-powered, so I decided to try this and use Spotify TUI to control it by streaming to the desktop app; all in all, I hate how limited the devices thing is, but at least it works MUCH BETTER than the regular Spotify Snap on low powered computers like mine!
summary: Spotify TUI is much lighter! EXCELLENT!

description:
never managed to get it working spent hours copying passwords & numbers & always ended up with "invalid uri" 
gave up this should never be this hard surely, all i want is a one click add spotify to my computer this is 2020 not 1995 !
summary: Waste of a lot of time

description: Worked with my phone, but I just wanted to play it on my computer. Play the music on my alsa device please. Spotifyd seems to not work at all. Installed spotifyd, but the ./config file was totally missing. This sub-dependency keeps this app from working like I wanted. Too bad i love the terminal interface look of this. Fix it please!
Works great with ubuntu 20.04.2. Thanks for that!

Siguiendo los pasos al pie d ela letra se configura rapidicimos. A mi me faltó tener la cuenta Premium para poder reproducir pero aún asi te muetsra tus playlist y demás, en breve la activare mi cuenta Premium para el último paso.
Me gusto la app y como funciona, solo para poder utilizarla bien si se necesita una cuenta premium, pero todo lo demás esta bien
i like it, but it doesnt work
